troubleshooting.title: Cannot Associate With a File Type on My Windows Computer

keywords.indexterm: Open With dialog box in Windows Explorer

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: I cannot associate the application with a file type on my Windows computer by right-clicking a file in Windows Explorer, selecting Open With Choose Program , and browsing to the file . When I select the file in the Windows file browser dialog box, the application is not added to the list of applications in the Open With dialog box.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: The problem is usually due to old Windows registry entries remaining from previous versions of .

steps-informal.p: Uninstall all your installed versions of and reinstall your current version of . If you only have the current version installed, you could try to reinstall it without uninstalling it first.
